title: Bug 18285 - Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: When double-clicking on an import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type, instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: The editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference when double-clicking on an import statement in the package view outline.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the package view outline. 
2. Find an import statement. 
3. Double-click on the import statement. 
4. Note that the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
